TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is a NORP national , who was born in DATE and lives in the city of GPE , GPE . The respondent Government were represented by their Agents – Mrs V. ORG , succeeded by PERSON .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

In DATE the applicant 's employer - ORG ( hereinafter – the “ SMCF ” ) put the applicant 's name on a priority housing list ( position no . CARDINAL at the material time ) for obtaining a dwelling to which he was entitled according to the relevant law after having been appointed as a “ young specialist ” . This priority list was designated for persons who were entitled to receive a dwelling without waiting their turn in the general housing list . The applicant was provided with a room in a hostel ( where he is currently residing ) as temporary accommodation in the meantime .

By a judgment of DATE , the ORG of GPE found that the applicant had a right to obtain a dwelling from his employer without waiting his turn ( позачергово ) , and obliged the SMCF to provide him with such accommodation . The court stated in particular :

“ Having heard the claimant and the representative of the ORG , and having examined the case - file , the court considers that the claims of Mr. PERSON are well - founded since , as a young specialist who arrived for work at the enterprise after graduation , he was entitled to receive an individual dwelling without waiting his turn , as indicated in certificate no . DATE . However , after his name was put on the priority housing list ... under no . CARDINAL , Mr. PERSON [ now holds ] ... priority ... under no . DATE , and the SMCF does not [ yet ] have the possibility to provide him with a dwelling . Since the applicant continues his labour relations with ORG , which did not fulfil its obligations to the applicant , the SMCF [ must ] fulfil its obligation to provide the applicant with a separate dwelling . ...
The court has therefore decided to oblige the ORG to provide Mr. PERSON with a separate dwelling . ”
On DATE ORG of the Krasnogvardeyskiy ORG of Justice initiated enforcement proceedings on the basis of a writ of execution dated DATE .
On DATE , upon the bailiff 's request , the judge who had decided the case provided explanations as to the enforcement of the judgment . The judge held that :

“ under the [ court ] decision , the ORG , where Mr. PERSON has worked and continues working , “ is obliged to provide Mr. PERSON with a separate dwelling ” ... There were no grounds during the examination of the case , and there are no grounds now , for providing the claimant with a dwelling immediately or ahead of his turn in the housing list ... ”
On DATE the enforcement proceedings were terminated on the ground that the applicant 's name had been put on the priority housing list ( no . CARDINAL at the material time ) .
By a judgment of DATE the ORG of GPE found for the applicant and declared the decision of DATE , terminating the enforcement proceedings , null and void .
On DATE and CARDINAL DATE the Deputy Head of ORG of LOC informed the applicant that he was now no . CARDINAL on the priority housing list .
In DATE the applicant informed the ORG that he had lodged a claim against ORG for failure to enforce the judgment of DATE . The proceedings are pending before the first instance court .
The relevant extracts of LAW read as follows :
“ Everyone has the right to housing . The ORG creates conditions that enable every citizen to build , purchase a property , or to rent housing .
ORG in need of social protection are provided with housing by the ORG and bodies of local self - government , free of charge or at a price affordable to them , in accordance with the law .
No one shall be forcibly deprived of housing other than on the basis of the law , pursuant to a court decision . ”
“ Everyone has the right to a standard of living sufficient for himself or herself and his or her family , which includes adequate nutrition , clothing and housing . ”
“ ... Judicial decisions are adopted by the courts in the name of GPE and are mandatory for execution throughout the entire territory of GPE . ”

Article CARDINAL of the LAW provides for categories of persons entitled to a dwelling in an order of priority , including persons appointed to work outside the area of their habitual residence . The LAW further stipulates that the persons concerned shall be included in a priority housing list . However , the LAW does not set down any time - limits for the allocation of such dwellings .

Paragraph CARDINAL of the Decree provides that the employees sent for permanent work outside the area of their habitual residence shall be provided by their employer with priority accommodation , without having to wait their turn .
